Package simu.model

Class Customer

java.lang.Object
simu.model.Customer
public class Customer extends Object
Customer is the class for customers in the simulation model. Contains data for the customers and methods for handling the data.

  • Constructor Details

    • Customer

      public Customer(int rideCount, double wristbandChance, int minTicketPurchase, int maxTicketPurchase)
      Constructor for the Customer class. Initializes the customer with the given parameters. Sets a random amount of rides for the customer to ride and arrival time for the customer.
      Parameters:
      rideCount - Amount of rides in the simulation
      wristbandChance - Chance of the customer having a wristband
      minTicketPurchase - Minimum amount of tickets the customer can purchase
      maxTicketPurchase - Maximum amount of tickets the customer can purchase

    • report

      public double report()
      Method for reporting the customer's time in the system. Calculates the average time for wristband and ticket customers.
      Returns:
      Average time for wristband or ticket customers

    • setTotalTicketCount

      public static void setTotalTicketCount(int amount)

    • addTickets

      public void addTickets()
      Adds tickets to the customer. Generates a random amount of tickets between the min and max ticket purchase values. Adds the amount of tickets to the total ticket count in the simulation.
